: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel eased up a bit. He crossed his hands behind his back and slowy paced in front of the bot.

Darkangel: Well, Bloodblade, you managed to come through the atmosphere of this planet without any form of protection and survive. Now I'm sure you can realize how odd this is. These are dire times and we must be sure of those who walk among us.

Angel stops pacing, facing Bloodblade once again.

Darkangel: You seem very confused. Can you tell me where you came from and what your purpose is?


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Bloodblade tried to focus. His sensors were still uncalibrated and he 
barely understood the statement. Custody? He had to process a lot to 
grasp the meaning, but then he wondered. In the custody of whom, and 
why?

He took a moment before answering, proceeding through a rapid setup 
that would allow him to function a bit on the language and cognitive 
circuits.

Bloodblade: I am Bloodblade... Who are you? What did I do to deserve 
your custody? I hope I did nothing to dire...

Tyrael was amazed at just how confused this bot was. Somehow, he knew 
who he was, but it seemed like the rest of his hard drive had been... 
deleted... Who could have done that? Yet, his answer seemed all the 
more sincere.

He watched and waited for Darkangel to continue.

> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel looked Bloodblade square in the optics.
> 
> Darkangel: That's a question I should be asking you, stranger. You 
are in my custody. Now, identify yourself!
>

> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Bloodblade was still in a deep daze. He was not fully conscious of

>

lead 
> of the interrogation. I'll assist you, but you're in charge.
> 
> The crimson and silver bot shook slightly, as if trying to grasp 
what 
> was going on. He knew by his internal computer that his damages had 
> only been slightly repaired, but he could not remember anything of 
> how he got damaged this bad.
> 
> Bloodblade: W... who..?

<P>Angel stops pacing, facing Bloodblade once again.</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>You seem very confused. Can you tell me where you came from and what your purpose is?</P>
